General.Name: Basso Industry Corp
General.Description: Basso Industry Corp. manufactures and sells pneumatic tools. It offers wire, finish, sheathing, and insulation staplers; headless pinners and other specialty products; corrugated, finish and concrete, angle finishing, angle framing, coil, collated joist hanger, anchor, palm, metal connector, and anchoring nailers; and air impact wrenches, air ratchet wrenches, air sanders, air saws and air hammers, air drills and screw drivers, and die and angle grinders. The company also provides gas brad, gas straight and angle finish, gas framing, gas concrete pin, and gas haften roofing nailers; and gas fencing and medium crown staplers. In addition, it offers accessories and plastic case packages; and OEM/ODM services, such as die casting, heat treatment, machining, molding, painting, and plastic injection services. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
